title: Icebreaker
description: Safe for work and family. Find out who has weird habits without the scandal.

cards.content: Never have I ever Googled myself.
Never have I ever re-gifted a gift I received.
Never have I ever used someone else's toothbrush.
Never have I ever waved at someone who wasn't waving at me.
Never have I ever pushed a door that said 'Pull'.
Never have I ever lied to get out of plans.
Never have I ever worn dirty clothes out of the hamper.
Never have I ever eaten food out of the trash.
Never have I ever pretended to be on the phone to avoid someone.
Never have I ever tripped over my own feet in public.
Never have I ever sung in the shower.
Never have I ever peed in a pool.
Never have I ever forgotten where I parked my car.
Never have I ever bought something just because it was on sale.
Never have I ever lied about my age.
Never have I ever finished an entire pizza by myself.
Never have I ever eavesdropped on a stranger's conversation.
Never have I ever cheated on a board game.
Never have I ever dropped my phone on my face while lying down.
Never have I ever walked into a glass door.
Never have I ever lied about seeing a movie.
Never have I ever cried during a Disney movie.
Never have I ever pretended to know a song when I didn't.
Never have I ever cut my own hair.
Never have I ever had a crush on a fictional character.
Never have I ever forgotten someone's name immediately after meeting them.
Never have I ever accidentally insulted someone.
Never have I ever returned an item after wearing it.
Never have I ever talked to myself out loud.
Never have I ever mistaken a stranger for someone I knew.
Never have I ever slept through an alarm.
Never have I ever laughed at a joke I didn't get.
Never have I ever eaten food that fell on the floor (5-second rule).
Never have I ever accidentally spit on someone while talking.
Never have I ever successfully used a coupon.
Never have I ever been afraid of the dark as an adult.
Never have I ever tried a fad diet.
Never have I ever lied on my resume.
Never have I ever snooped in a medicine cabinet.
Never have I ever blamed a fart on the dog.
Never have I ever cried over a haircut.
Never have I ever worn socks with sandals.
Never have I ever used a fake name at Starbucks.
Never have I ever blocked a family member on social media.
Never have I ever stolen a pen from work.
Never have I ever had a nickname I hated.
Never have I ever locked myself out of the house.
Never have I ever practiced an argument in the shower.
Never have I ever pretended to be sick to skip work.
Never have I ever put gum under a table.
Never have I ever spoiled a movie ending for someone.
Never have I ever tried to cut my own bangs.
Never have I ever walked out of a movie theater.
Never have I ever danced in front of a mirror.
Never have I ever had a surprise party thrown for me.
Never have I ever bought something from an infomercial.
Never have I ever sent a text to the wrong person.
Never have I ever been trapped in an elevator.
Never have I ever tried to hold my breath through a tunnel.
Never have I ever worn underwear two days in a row.
